name: FlootBall
description:
FlootBall is a local 2D football multiplayer game, invite your friends and enjoy the FlootBall mayem. This game will require you to master the wanky physics to overcome the opposite team.

  • Would recommend to play between 2 and 4 players (supports 16 pads)
  • Works with SteamLink and Steam Controller
  • Warning no Keyboard and no AI (yet)
